alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 3:41PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Otero, northwestern Baca, eastern Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 340 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near North La Junta to 11 miles southwest of Higbee to near Hoehne. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Damaging winds could extend well ahead of thunderstorms. Locations impacted include... La Junta, Higbee, Model, Hoehne, Tyrone and Trinchera. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
